LanguageData.CMB_EnableRoofOverlay_Setting: Enable automatic roof overlay when using the Mine tool?
LanguageData.CMB_EnableRoofOverlayTooltip_Setting: When checked, the roof overlay will automatically show when the mining designator is selected. Uncheck this for known mining, like mountain bases may be one example.
LanguageData.CMB_EnableAutoThinRoof_Setting: Auto-designate known thin roofs (light green) for removal?
LanguageData.CMB_EnableAutoThinRoofTooltip_Setting: When checked, selecting the Mine tool will automatically mark known thin roofs for deconstruction.
LanguageData.CMB_EnableAutoThinRoofWarning_Setting: DANGER: Roofs can still be dropped on colonists heads if clearing unknown roof areas!!
LanguageData.CMB_DRMAutoThinRoofWarning_Setting: De-roof Mining is enabled, thin roof is disabled in this mod.
LanguageData.CMB_EnableFertilityOverlay_Setting: Enable automatic fertility overlay when using growing zones?
LanguageData.CMB_EnableFertilityOverlayTooltip_Settin: When checked, the fertility overlay will automatically show when growing zones is selected. Uncheck this for known growing.
LanguageData.CMB_EnableTerrainAffordanceOverlayToolti: When enabled, selecting planning/build designators will toggle the terrain affordance overlay.
LanguageData.CMB_EnablePlanningTerrainOverlayTooltip_: Show terrain affordability when selecting the Planning tool.
LanguageData.CMB_EnableBuildingTerrainOverlayTooltip_: Show terrain affordability when selecting to build something.
LanguageData.CMB_TerrainCatWallsTooltip: Overlay is shown for Walls, Doors, and Fences.
LanguageData.CMB_TerrainCatFloorsTooltip: Overlay is shown for Floors and Bridges.
LanguageData.CMB_TerrainCatFurnitureTooltip: Overlay is shown for everything that is not a Wall, Door, or Fence.
